name: Downcast Asylum
description:
An injured teenage boy makes his way to an old decrepit building off the road seeking help... instead, he finds a place crawling with ghosts.

------

This is Terror Friendly's second game, inspired by the RPG Maker Game Jam and made in 1 day.

It plays as an interactive horror story. Contains some blood, viewer discretion is advised.

Playtime is about 5 mins.
